Data Fields
sg_font_char_t Struct Reference

Font Character Data. More...

#include <sg_font_types.h>

Detailed Description

Holds the data for a font character.

Data Fields

Field Documentation

u8 sg_font_char_t::canvas_idx

The offset of the canvas

X location of the character on the canvas
